verification.title: Identity Verification
verification.subtitle: Complete your verification to access all features
verification.step1Description: Please upload clear photos of your government-issued ID (front and back).
verification.step2Description: We'll use face recognition to match your ID with your photo.
verification.successDescription: Your documents have been uploaded successfully. Please wait for admin approval.
verification.pendingDescription: Your documents are being reviewed by our team.
verification.approvedDescription: Your identity has been verified successfully.
verification.rejectedDescription: Your verification was rejected. Please contact support.

home.verificationPendingSubtitle: Thank you for submitting your verification documents. Our team is currently reviewing your information. You'll receive a notification once your verification is complete.
home.reviewDocuments: Our team reviews your submitted documents
home.emailNotification: You'll receive an email notification when complete

notifications.pageSubtitle: Stay updated with important alerts and reminders.
